column1: * Includes crude oil, shale oil, oil sands, condensates (both lease condensate and gas plant condensate) and NGLs (natural gas liquids - ethane, LPG and naptha separated from the production of natural gas).
Excludes liquid fuels from other sources such as biomass and derivatives of coal and natural gas.
USSR includes Georgia, Ukraine and the Baltic States.
# Excludes Estonia, Latvia and Lithuania prior to 1985 and Croatia and Slovenia prior to 1990.
Note: Annual changes and shares of total are calculated using thousand barrels daily figures.
